entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to light snow and ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
